T02D2116:156a-0: @156a ` // 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2116:156a-1: shi ba la phan gdags pa ro sreg pa ni /
T02D2116:156a-2: manda la drug gi cho ga bya /
T02D2116:156a-3: de nas ro khang bur bcug la /
T02D2116:156a-4: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis ro de la bsngags sam //
T02D2116:156a-5: yungs kar la bsngags te mi dmigs par bsam /
T02D2116:156a-6: de la dang po 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsgom /
T02D2116:156a-7: bdag gi thugs ka'i aa las 'od 'phros pas 'gro
T02D2116:156a-8: ba rigs drug gi sgrib pa sbyang bar bsam mo
T02D2116:156a-9: // de nas me bcug la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya /
T02D2116:156a-10: de nas mchod pa dbul 'dud dang 'jam dpal gyi bstod pa bya /
T02D2116:156a-11: de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol /
